title: Force of Evil
actors: John Garfield,Thomas Gomez,Marie Windsor,Howland Chamberlain,Roy Roberts,Paul Fix,Stanley Prager,Barry Kelley,Paul McVey,Beatrice Pearson,Arthur O'Connell,Georgia Backus,Margaret Bert,Estelle Etterre,Sherry Hall
summary: Lawyer Joe Morse wants to consolidate all the small-time numbers racket operators into one big powerful operation. But his elder brother Leo is one of these small-time operators who wants to stay that way, preferring not to deal with the gangsters who dominate the big-time.
